description: Ready for some racing fun? The Catch My Drift Humble Bundle has some quality stuff inside. So here's all you'll need to know about Steam Deck and Desktop Linux compatibility.
title: You can get art of rally, MudRunner, Circuit Superstats and more in this bundle

description: Mega Crit have announced Slay the Spire 2 during the Triple-I showcase, a game that no doubt will be exciting for many with how great the first is.
title: Slay the Spire 2 announced by Mega Crit for 2025

description: Remember Playtron and PlaytronOS? They made an attempt at a big splash recently with plans to create a Linux-powered system to rival SteamOS (Steam Deck) and Windows across various devices and multiple stores. The first device has been announced and it's some weird web3 thing.
title: The first handheld to use PlaytronOS is some Web3 thing - the SuiPlay0x1

description: Always nice to see more developers open up their games. ROTA released back in 2022 is now not only free, but it's also been made open source by the dev.
title: Cute gravity-bending platformer ROTA is now free and open source

description: Noita is something really special, a roguelite game where every pixel is physically simulated and it's easily one of the best games ever made. It's grown again with another big free upgrade out with the Noita Epilogue 2 Update.
title: The incredible pixel-smashing game Noita got a huge free update

description: The open source TR1X engine for running Tomb Raider 1 continues to bring in lots of enhancements, making it easily one of the best ways to play the original on PC.
title: Tomb Raider 1 open source engine TR1X adds a 60FPS mode

description: Boxelware, developer of space sim Avorion just revealed Aquapark Tycoon, that's set to deliver a unique fusion of creativity, strategic planning and park management offering you the chance to design, build, and oversee your very own water park.
title: Aquapark Tycoon is a waterpark building sim from the dev of Avorion

description: ProtonUp-Qt is back for another update, remaining as one of the easiest ways to install extra compatibility tools on Steam Deck and Desktop Linux with version 2.9.2 out now.
title: GE-Proton installer ProtonUp-Qt v2.9.2 released

description: Besiege is good fun having you construct various mechanical machines for destruction, and now it's all going to get a bit wet in The Splintered Sea expansion.
title: The Splintered Sea expansion announced for physics building game Besiege

description: If you're a shoot 'em up fan you've been eating good recently, with another quality set of games out now in the Toaplan Arcade Shoot ‘Em Up Collection Vol.4.
title: Toaplan Arcade Shoot 'Em Up Collection Vol.4 is out now with more classics

description: Please, Touch The Artwork 2 is a free and highly rated hand-painted cozy hidden object adventure out now, and recently it had some nice Steam Deck improvements.
title: Please, Touch The Artwork 2 gets a bunch of Steam Deck improvements
